titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify the deduction for business use of the home.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E205-206)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/27/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code with respect to the deduction for business use of the home to provide that the principal place of business is where substantially all of the management activities of the trade or business occur.
